name: Bargaining Table (V)
Lore: 'The alcoves of Jabba''s palace are good places to make deals and place bets. Jabba gets a cut of the profits, of course.',
Text: 'Deploy on table.  Your unique (•) aliens are forfeit +1 (+2 if they have printed deploy costs greater than or equal to their printed forfeit).  During your deploy phase, may deploy one Attark, Crell, Loje, Momaw, Tzizvvt, or Vul from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. (Immune to Alter.)(Errata Text - September 9th, 2009)',
